channel.title: Skills Button Bug?
channel.description:
![bug|690x388](upload://zm6cS1RBtLzyotVM43F9SEMA9hW.jpg)
Today when im playin game at night3 there is no skill button, and that was not just for me, with that bug, no one had skills button, i think u should fix it.

item.title: Skills Button Bug?
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Well I doubt everyone in general has this, so without host or client logs (which I assume you don’t have), we can’t really know what 'caused it particularly in this game.

Read full topic
